name: Strongest Cock in the Coop
description:
There's only room for two chickens in this coop! Work together to force the rest out and take the space for yourselves. Join this 2v2 game and work together with your teammate in order to take over the coop! May the best cock win!

Strongest Cock in the Coop is an all out brawling experience, played with only one keyboard and one screen. Great for starting fights in game and out. A funny co-op game that only requires you and your friends. 

The game features:

-Silly chickens

-Funny hats!

-LOTS of chicken noises

-John Chena <3

-Funky music!

Made by Bing Chilling Studios for the Confetti Game Jam.
